eu.amidst.core.conceptdrift

Class NaiveBayesVirtualConceptDriftDetector

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.amidst.core.conceptdrift.NaiveBayesVirtualConceptDriftDetector

  • public class NaiveBayesVirtualConceptDriftDetector
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the functionality for using the concept drift apporoach based on probabilitic graphical models detailed in the following paper, Borchani et al. Modeling concept drift: A probabilistic graphical model based approach. IDA 2015.

    For an example of use follow this link

    http://amidst.github.io/toolbox/CodeExamples.html#nbconceptdriftexample

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  NaiveBayesVirtualConceptDriftDetector.DriftDetector
      Represents the drift detection mode.

      • updateModel

        public double[] updateModel(DataOnMemory<DataInstance> batch)
        Update the model with a new batch of instances. The size of the batch should be equal to the size of the window of the class
        Parameters:
        batch, - a DataOnMemory object containing a batch of data instances.
        Returns:
        An array of double values containing the expected value of the global hidden variables.
